Text: Please SEED after you are done downloading!

Thanks for providing this, but I'm not sure if I'm interested.  It would be nice to have a sample shot.

It probably wouldn't be necessary if this was a torrent of individual files, instead of one big zip file.

this zip file is the real deal... love Kira and wish she would come back but alas she's gone (not dead just quite posting).  No password on the zip and while it took forever to download it's worth it!  Anyone who doesnt know who Kira is should just do a google image search ... trust me you wont be disappointed.
